comment.author: 15264933@N04
comment._content:
Nice! Will you be pretending to be a pirate? :)

Went there a few years ago on the recommendation by the Saw Docs... a line in the song mentions skinny dipping. Well I dipped my big toe into that water and it dropped off through cold and sheer fright. No skinny dipping for me!

Apart from the barrels and the clothes, it looks the same!

That scene in the background between the harbour walls is like something out of a Constable painting.

comment._content:
Strange hat on the gent to left. Military?

And we have a boy who appears to be wearing a dress and some sort of white pinafore.
But he's much too old for that dressing small boys as girls routine discussed yesterday.

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland] Enjoy the break Carol and I hope that the weather will be kind to you.  Just back from Cornwall and it was just mixed but with wellies and waterproofs you can still enjoy yourself.  As [http://www.flickr.com/photos/64555638@N00] says we did have some related photos some time ago with (I think) the Prince of Wales and party of artists etc. who had landed there.  The quality of this is very good and I will have to do a search on when the peelers wore pilboxes.
